sentences.sContent: These are not involved as exclusively as ministers in "soul-work," but they certainly cultivate the inner life more than the third group.
sentences.sContent_eng: These are not involved as exclusively as ministers in "soul-work," but they certainly cultivate the inner life more than the third group.
sentences.sCn: 他们虽不像牧师那样专门做“灵魂方面的工作”，但是肯定比第三群体更注重于建造人类的生命。

words.tran: 独家新闻；独家经营的项目；排外者
排除；排斥；驱逐；被排除在外的事物
排除；排斥；拒绝接纳；逐出
